snippet: Commissioner Gary Bettman said Wednesday that the N.H.L.’s concussion protocol was working, and that the league was serious about enforcing it.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Gary Bettman said Wednesday that the N.H.L.’s concussion protocol was working, and that the league was serious about enforcing it.

headline.main: Bettman Addresses N.H.L. Players’ Efforts to Hide Concussions
headline.print_headline: Bettman Addresses Players’ Efforts to Hide Concussions
